body:
Hi All,

I opened  Chris Mackey's first example geometry file which is Mackey Residence Geometry.gh in Grasshopper but I am not seeing any geometry in Rhino. Can anybody please tell me how to open this geometry in Rhino.Please also let me know how to make Rhino background white.



Thanks,

Khandaker Rasel
topic: Example geometry file of of Mackey Residence Geometry.gh is now showing in rhino
